title: Generate baseline configuration files for tsconfig files
description: Generate baseline TypeScript configuration files for tsconfig files found in projects

projectsFilter.description: Nx filter syntax to filter projects (e.g., ['--tags=scope:api', '--affected', '--exclude=*-e2e'])

configMatcher.description: Glob pattern to match tsconfig files (e.g., 'tsconfig.*.json' or 'tsconfig.{lib,test}.json')

skipExisting.description: Skip creating baseline files if they already exist
